original_title: Economy | Today's latest from Al Jazeera
article_summary: Trump buys over $100m in bonds, including Meta, Wells Fargo, and Intel; Sanders supports government stake in Intel; Trump calls for Fed Gov Cook's resignation; Target names new CEO; China offers cooperation with Taliban; US threatens transit funds cut over safety; Church moved in Sweden for mine expansion; UK drops Apple 'back door' mandate; MSNBC rebrands; Air Canada CEO and union clash over strike; Mixed reactions to US CPI report.</s>
